
## R Markdown
```{r}
xx <- rnorm(50)
yy <- rnorm(50)
df <- cbind(xx,yy)
fig <- ggplot(data=NULL,aes(x=xx, y=yy)) + 
    geom_point()+
  annotate("segment", x = 0, xend = -0.32*4, y = 0, yend = 0.95*4, colour = "pink", size=1, alpha=0.6, arrow=arrow()) + 
  annotate("segment", x = 0, xend = -0.95*4, y = 0, yend = -0.32*4, colour = "pink", size=1, alpha=0.6, arrow=arrow())
ggplotly(fig)
```
